    • Method Detail

      • getRotationAngleForBitmap

        public static int getRotationAngleForBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                            android.net.Uri uri)
        Gets the bitmap rotation angle from the ExifInterface.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context for the content resolver.
        uri - The URI to find the orientation for. Must be local.
        Returns:
        The orientation value, which may be ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_UNDEFINED.

      • getOrientationForBitmap

        public static int getOrientationForBitmap(android.content.Context context,
                                          android.net.Uri uri)
        Gets the ExifInterface value for the orientation for this local bitmap Uri.
        Parameters:
        context - Application context for the content resolver.
        uri - The URI to find the orientation for. Must be local.
        Returns:
        The orientation value, which may be ExifInterface.ORIENTATION_UNDEFINED.

      • decodeBitmapDimensions

        public static android.graphics.BitmapFactory.Options decodeBitmapDimensions(java.io.InputStream stream)

        public static int getSampleSize(int w,
                                int h,
                                int maxSize)

      • resizeImage

        public static java.io.InputStream resizeImage(java.io.InputStream fullImageStream,
                                              int maxSize,
                                              int aSampleSize,
                                              int quality)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Resize an image from its stream.
        Parameters:
        fullImageStream - the image stream
        maxSize - the square side to draw the image in. -1 to ignore.
        aSampleSize - the image dimension divider.
        quality - the image quality (0 -> 100)
        Returns:
        a stream of the resized imaged
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - file IO exception.

      • rotateImage

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap rotateImage(android.content.Context context,
                                                  java.lang.String imageURL,
                                                  int rotationAngle,
                                                  MXMediasCache mediasCache)
        Apply rotation to the cached image (stored at imageURL). The rotated image replaces the genuine one.
        Parameters:
        context - the application
        imageURL - the genuine image URL.
        rotationAngle - angle in degrees
        mediasCache - the used media cache
        Returns:
        the rotated bitmap

      • applyExifRotation

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap applyExifRotation(android.content.Context context,
                                                        java.lang.String imageURL,
                                                        MXMediasCache mediasCache)
        Apply exif rotation to the cached image (stored at imageURL). The rotated image replaces the genuine one.
        Parameters:
        context - the application
        imageURL - the genuine image URL.
        mediasCache - the used media cache
        Returns:
        the rotated bitmap if the operation succeeds.

      • scaleAndRotateImage

        public static java.lang.String scaleAndRotateImage(android.content.Context context,
                                                   java.io.InputStream stream,
                                                   java.lang.String mimeType,
                                                   int maxSide,
                                                   int rotationAngle,
                                                   MXMediasCache mediasCache)
        Scale and apply exif rotation to an image defines by its stream.
        Parameters:
        context - the context
        stream - the image stream
        mimeType - the mime type
        maxSide - reduce the image to this square side.
        rotationAngle - the rotation angle
        mediasCache - the media cache.
        Returns:
        the media url
